docs.snippet: A report describes the complicated diet of a big-league doper who juggled four injections with two muscle treatments, two skin creams, two lozenges and six oral doses....
docs.lead_paragraph: A report describes the complicated diet of a big-league doper who juggled four injections with two muscle treatments, two skin creams, two lozenges and six oral doses.
docs.abstract: Report by Major League Baseball chief arbitrator Fredric Horowitz describes complicated doping habits of New York Yankees slugger Alex Rodriguez in ruling on his suspension; report is coda to one of longest running soap operas in sports; Rodriguez is asking federal judge to vacate his 2014 season-long suspension.

docs.snippet: It was hardly a surprise that lawyers for Alex Rodriguez went to federal court to try to halt his suspension, but what was stunning was the degree to which the filing targets Rodriguez’s own union....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was hardly a surprise that lawyers for Alex Rodriguez went to federal court to try to halt his suspension, but what was stunning was the degree to which the filing targets Rodriguez’s own union.
docs.abstract: Lawyers for Alex Rodriguez go to federal court in Manhattan and file lawsuit to vacate his season-long doping suspension.

headline.main: In Court Fight, Rodriguez Comes Out Swinging Against Players Union

docs.snippet: In filing a lawsuit against Major League Baseball and the player’s union, Alex Rodriguez made some of the evidence against him public, and it suggests he deserved to be punished....
docs.lead_paragraph: In filing a lawsuit against Major League Baseball and the player’s union, Alex Rodriguez made some of the evidence against him public, and it suggests he deserved to be punished.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column observes that in filing a lawsuit against Major League Baseball and the player’s union, Alex Rodriguez made some of the evidence against him public; contends evidence shows that Rodriguez deserves the ban for being the dumbest doper ever, someone who deserved to be punished just for pushing his luck.
